程序包 org.am21.utilities

类 VirtualViewHelper

java.lang.Object
org.am21.utilities.VirtualViewHelper
public class VirtualViewHelper extends Object
We use this class to build the virtual view

  • 方法详细资料

    • buildVirtualView

      public static void buildVirtualView(Match match)
      This method will build the virtual view Call this method before the match starts, after the match data is initialized
      参数:
      match - the match

    • updateVirtualScores

      public static void updateVirtualScores(Match match)
      This method will set the scores of each player to the virtual view
      参数:
      match - the match

    • updateVirtualShelves

      public static void updateVirtualShelves(Match match)
      This method will set the shelves of each player to the virtual view recommend to use this method when each round ends
      参数:
      match - the match

    • virtualizeBoard

      public static void virtualizeBoard(Match match)
      This method will virtualize the Board. Code: - null -> empty cell - "value" -> ItemName - ">value" -> Selected Cell Call this method for setup or for update.
      参数:
      match - the match

    • virtualizeCurrentPlayer

      public static void virtualizeCurrentPlayer(Match match)
      This method will set the common goal to the virtual view call this method every time the round starts
      参数:
      match - the match

    • updateCommonGoalScore

      public static void updateCommonGoalScore(Match match)
      This method will set the common goal score to the virtual view call this method once someone completes a common goal
      参数:
      match - the match

    • virtualizeEndGame

      public static void virtualizeEndGame(Match match)
      This method will set the end game token to the virtual view
      参数:
      match - the match

    • virtualizeMatchID

      public static void virtualizeMatchID(Match match)
      This method will set the match ID to the virtual view
      参数:
      match - the match

      参数:

      gR - game result matrix

      public static void virtualizePublicChat(Match m, List<String> chat)
      Use chatManager openChat method
      参数:
      m - match instance
      chat - chat history to be virtualized
